METRICS_AP.name: num_sta[0]
METRICS_AP.help: Number of active stations of the VAP

METRICS_AP.name: max_txpower
METRICS_AP.help: Max TX Power of the VAP

METRICS_STA.name: signal
METRICS_STA.help: signal in dbms of a station in a VAP

METRICS_STA.name: rx_bytes
METRICS_STA.help: Received bytes from the STA to the VAP

METRICS_STA.name: tx_bytes
METRICS_STA.help: Transmitted bytes from the VAP to the STA

METRICS_STA.name: connected_time
METRICS_STA.help: Connected time in seconds of a STA in a VAP

METRICS_STA.name: inactive_msec
METRICS_STA.help: inactive time in msecs of a STA in a VAP

METRICS_STA.name: rx_rate_info
METRICS_STA.help: Link rate from the STA to the VAP in Mbps

METRICS_STA.name: tx_rate_info
METRICS_STA.help: Link rate from the VAP to the STA in Mbps
